resources.string: Six people went on a walk together. But they got separated. Your job is to make these people reach where they ought to be. Unfortunately, you have to follow certain basic traffic rules so while you move one of them a few other will move accordingly. With this constraint you have to make them reach their places in reasonable time.

Raghavendra Tripathi for his extremely valuable inputs 
Himanshu Grover for his creativity 
Luke Deighton for his awesome WheelView 
Gabriel Araujo for creating melodies 
freepik.com for its beautiful illustrations 
FBStart for selecting this game for its generous grant :) 


Want to say hi ? Drop a mail at teamtoroshu@gmail.com
